tasks.title: Phase 3: VAD-based Chunked Streaming
tasks.description: Implement VAD-based chunked streaming to fix long audio accuracy degradation (>60s). Process audio in natural speech segments, concatenate transcriptions incrementally, and leverage existing VAD infrastructure.

tasks.title: Phase 4: Active Window Context
tasks.description: Capture window titles and bundle IDs for active window context.

tasks.title: Phase 5: Installer & Permissions
tasks.description: Implement onboarding flow for Accessibility Permissions and Screen Recording/Microphone permissions.

tasks.title: Phase 5: Settings UI
tasks.description: Implement Settings UI for model selection and mic sensitivity.
